thread.title: Christian women's conference to celebrate 20th anniversary at weekend
thread.title_full: Christian women's conference to celebrate 20th anniversary at weekend

author: Simtembile Mgidi
title: Christian women's conference to celebrate 20th anniversary at weekend
text:
Christian women’s conference to celebrate 20th anniversary at weekend
To commemorate its 20th anniversary, the local Arise Women’s Conference is set to welcome more than 600 women to the Word of Faith Christian Centre at the weekend.
The conference, under the theme “Victorious”, will feature international guest speakers including Wyona Norman and Michelle Amy Norman, local pastor Abby Blignaut, as well as its founder, Pastor Mariana Crompton...
